page.title: 14Home Life
page.content: I attend Hemingbrough Primary School.I get up for 8-00am, get dressed in my school uniform which is grey with a blue and gold striped tie,then I go down and have breakfast of toast and milk. At 8-30am I arrive at school on my bike.School opens at 9-00 when we have Assembly. Afterwards we have lessons until 10-30 when we have a break.Lessons continue until noon when I go home for my dinner.Most children stay at school.After dinner we play until 1-00pm when we have a different teacher. School ends at 3-30 and then we take part in activities.Sometimes after school I go fishing, sometimes I go to the playing field.My favourite meal is meat, potatoes, carrots and gravy followed by rice pudding. Sometimes I go back to school at night for a Disco. Then I go to bed at 9-30pm after having milk and biscuits.
